title: Mamdani discourages Hakeem Jeffries' primary challenger, tells city council member to 'focus' on NYC
text: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani told local news that now is not the time for city Council Member Chi Ossé to challenge House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries.
summary: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani told local news that now is not the time for city Council Member Chi Ossé to challenge House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries.
source: Latest & Breaking News on Fox News
